title: Silver Bullet 1985 DVDR R4 NTSC
description:
The small town of Mill Tarkers always been a peaceful place where nothing ever happened ... Until one day violent murders begin to occur. Locals think these deaths are due to some maniac on the loose. But the young Marty (Corey Haim) believes that the killer is not a person but a werewolf. After escaping from such a monster, Marty and his sister Jane (Megan Follows) run throughout the city in search of the man who is actually a disgusting creature. But does anyone will believe them?
